author: Paul Mathew
description: Burnt orange oils add smoky notes, complexity and balance to this bittersweet drink. A perfect after-dinner cocktail.
name: Beginning of the End
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: FLAME an orange zest twist into empty glass to line the inside with smoky oils
Then STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into the pre-prepared glass
